license.comments: To use this SDK (LINE ADS NETWORK SDK, also called Five SDK or FiveAd SDK), contact LINE ADS NETWORK team. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE LINE ADS NETWORK SDK LICENSE AGREEMENT, YOU ARE NOT AUTHORIZED TO AND YOU MAY NOT DOWNLOAD THE LINE ADS NETWORK SDK.
